website_summaries.verdict: A low-priced reformer with few features and extras, but still useful.
pros: Comes with two DVDs and full-color wall chart for reference
Completely adjustable for taller or shorter people
Can be used for a wide variety of exercises
cons: Can't be used or outfitted for rebounder or jump board
Some cushions may have an odor and need to be aired out before use

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Extremely fast shipping. Easy assembly. Only complaint is that the resistant cords are a little too light. Will be buying heavier resistance cords for it.
customer_reviews.author: SMF

customer_reviews.title: ... avid pilates lover and reformer user this option is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: As an avid pilates lover and reformer user this option is fantastic!!!! Super easy to put together. Very smooth gliding. Only complaint is that the cords aren't enough resistance for me but I bought a couple red ones so HAPPY HAPPY with the purchase. You wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best Piece of Lifestyle Equipment Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a Pilates Performer more than 10 years ago and I loved it. This model builds upon that machine and so much more. I felt great after just one workout. It was important to me to choose exercise that would strengthen my core after having developed degenerative disc disease. This makes working out fun again and it's a commitment I look forward to keeping 4 days/week. It's also compact so it hardly takes up any space in my 1-bedroom apartment.
customer_reviews.author: T.J. Sachs

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: I like the machine a lot, but it is heavy. Fortunately it comes with wheels! The resistance wasn't enough so I bought the red bands and we are back in business. The gliding is not as smooth as I'd like. I'm hoping that after a few uses it will work itself out. Extremely easy to put together. I wish there was another option for the handles but I also haven't taken the time to research this. I bought the stand to go with it, but the stand is absolutely unnecessary so feel free to save yourself the hundred bucks.... Unless you have difficulty getting up from the floor...
customer_reviews.author: ESM

customer_reviews.title: A great reformer at a FANTASTIC price
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this machine. It comes with a poster of exercises to do, and it's super easy to find videos online if you like having someone to follow along with. It's light enough that I can fold it up and put it away easily, and safe enough that my kids can use it, too. And it's such an effective workout - my arms and core have never felt stronger! The only downside is that there are only three resistance bands and not five, but that's a minor issue for me. I don't need that much variety in resistance configuration and can get by with two medium and one heavy resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Z

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED THIS HONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely EXCELLENT machine! Breezy(and extremely minimal) assembly. Awesome workouts with this baby! I've never done Pilates in my life, but always wanted to, and now I feel like a pro and have only had it less than a month? Want to buy all the accessories and upgrades and become a rock hard, rippling Pilates devotee for life! Buy one! 💙
customer_reviews.author: Madalyn Magnuson

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best, but Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I've owned Pilates reformers in every country I've lived in -- I sell them or give them away when I leave. I'm in Mexico now and for the price I couldn't believe I got free Prime delivery. It doesn't quite match the photo (it's grey) and it's a little on the flimsy side, but I had a stand built for it and it will do just fine. Only three cords, and the instructions say there are four. Oh, well, almost perfect is still good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Regular

customer_reviews.title: Review update
customer_reviews.text: My preliminary review was negative as the package did not include CD’s in the product description and manual suggested that only on line access was included. CD’s are not cheap. I contacted supplier, provided data, and 2 days later the CD’s arrived. Assembly manual is still inaccurate but no uncommon for products manufactured in the Orient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to set up, though it is missing two screws that attach the bar at the end. It is still functional without these screws. The bungee make it easy to adjust resistance. The handles on the pull strings are comfy. The track is nice and smooth which means it isnt distracting during use. It folds up fairly easily to hide away when not in use. The pad is comfortable and has held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Good but I would get the next better model
customer_reviews.text: While it's good to have a reformer at home I really miss the risers, too many exercise are hindered by the straps scratching my shoulders or head and it feels very small/short, I feel crammed on this reformer and I am 5'6". It's nice that can be folded but I find it a clumsy procedure. The lack of risers does mean that I can slide in and out of under the sofa very quickly, love that! (but still I wish I had risers while exercising :)
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Customer service. What customer service?
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the machine and wish I can give them higher reading. It is unfortunate but heir customer service is terrible. They couldn't help me find the code to redeem for the videos! If they can't do that, I can't imagine how painful it would be to buy a cord. I always give positive ratings but they really made me angry with their lack of care for the customer.
customer_reviews.author: Pugglelover

customer_reviews.title: I love this reformer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my new reformer! It’s so perfect! It fits in my tiny 400sq ft apartment and folds up really easily. Assembly only took about 10 minutes and I switched out two of the black cords with the red ones I ordered. They give a much better resistance for foot work. I’m so happy with my purchase! YouTube has a lot of great reformer workouts so I feel like I’m in class. I highly recommend this reformer!!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a reformer for years so I was so excited to try this. It sits low so I would like to get the stand. All in all I love it but it would be nice to have the option to raise the pulleys. The rope rubs my shoulders during certain exercises. Otherwise this is a great starter reformer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Machine
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Pilates owner for years and decided it was time to get another machine. I am really pleased with this model. I am a senior in need of gentle stretching and toning. Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Good deal

customer_reviews.title: Love it and recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Perfect for me as I am a beginner. Good price. Only has 3 resistance cords. You might want to consider one with more if you like it on the heavier side. Or more advanced. My fiancé loves it too! I just search some youtube videos and follow along. I break a sweat fast! And sore from using it. I ordered the rebounder for more workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Azucena Canales

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, does what was expected.
customer_reviews.text: My first Pilates experience. I was surprised by how much tension was in the cables, which I appreciated. I was reading people say they purchased more tense cables, but I would not be ready for that as a first time user. I Like the poster with exercise ideas since I’m a beginner. My kids even enjoy trying it out.
customer_reviews.author: IMNRN

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this reformer. It doesn’t quite have the feel of the heavier machines you’d find in studios, but this little guy does the trick in terms of providing an effective work out. I purchased the rebounder separately and am glad that I did. I’d been practicing for over 5 years with a private instructor but now don’t have an easy schedule for lessons. This makes working out easy and essential for keeping my back healthy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Love this, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: 100% recommend. I am so happy with this purchase. With the pandemic, I can no longer go to my pilates classes. This reformer has saved my life. I am able to continue my pilates, and it has truly brought me so much peace in this crazy time. Obviously it’s not a $5000 reformer, but it has all of the basic functions that you’d need. The price of it is great, it’s less than one month at my pilates studio. I definitely recommend and only wish I had bought it sooner! It is quite heavy so probably not ideal to move it around much but it does have wheels, which I find to be a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Talia Rotshtein

customer_reviews.title: I am a beginner, and this was EASY!
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can find tons of youtube videos on fitness routines. Great for low impact work outs. It's a great start but you will need to buy add ons to increase work out intensity and options. Add ons example, a pilates box, bar, tension ropes etc.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member- Buys everything from Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for its value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for its value. Very sturdy and durable. It also comes with a large poster of different exercises and online video access. Only con is when you do leg circles (and similar exercises), the straps will hit your shoulders/arms since they are not elevated. I also had to wrap the rope adjustment brackets with cloth as the metal would potentially scratch the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Chiu

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing - seamless, easy, effective
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Easy to use and maneuver, was worried it would feel flimsy or weak but it is built solidly and feels solid and comes almost all the way assembled. Effective resistance on the cables, could probably switch them out if you need more strength. So happy with this purchase!!!!! Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good machine but probably not new as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Seem to have gotten a used product because there was a “stain” on the cushion and one of the resistance bands is a bit worn but putting it together was simple enough and so far I have liked it - we will see how they are able to resolve the stain and more importantly the band issue.
customer_reviews.author: Para-d

customer_reviews.title: I am so EXCITED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond words on how awesome this Pilates Reformer is for my Exercise Program!! I have taken Pilates and Pilates Reformer for the past few years. I had to stop going to the studio a year ago because of scheduling. I missed it so much, and have been wanting to get back to it, and now i can!! I love that the unit collapses and just tucks away in a corner. I would highly recommend this product. I actually found this reformer on the top reformers reviews as the best reformer for your money. That's how I found it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good reformer for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to do Pilates. My husband uses it instead of lifting weights. We can both get a good workout on this reformer. We have limited space so the small size is perfect for us. It’s not easy to put my feet in the straps, but doable. Overall we are very pleased with the reformer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to pricey studio models
customer_reviews.text: I adore this machine! It was super easy to assemble, and stores nicely. I use it for 15 minutes of leg & hip work every day, and find it comparable to studio machines in terms of the workout I get.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good! The only thing is that it's narrow then I thought , and I ordered different handle straps. Except that, I really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: avi

customer_reviews.title: Price and convenience
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic because it allows me to exercise at home - when I want to and for as long as I want. Cheaper than going to a class. The down-side ..... having to open it out and put it away - although this only takes a minute.... and needing space to store it. It's not super robust - so I am careful with it. After just a couple of weeks I feel stronger - which is fantastic! 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Monaghan

customer_reviews.title: East to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: This reformer allows for many different ways to stretch and strengthen your muscles. Very similar to the professional ones that cost much more more. easy to fold up and hide away. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Greenway

customer_reviews.title: reformer
customer_reviews.text: a little hard to assemble and difficult for me to move from area to area when needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after taking reformer classes at Equinox. I found that having a reformer at home meant that I could easily practice daily. As of now, I think I’ve probably used it 20-30x. I purchased some additional cords for greater training purposes. I’m super happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I love Pilates on a reformer! I’ve been looking for an affordable reformer for a while. As a mom of 2 young kids it’s hard to get to a class so this was perfect for me. It’s great for the workout I need whenever I can fit it in!
customer_reviews.author: Liza Gage

customer_reviews.title: Solid device
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and compact. Resistance maxes out at a medium level. Perfect if you are wanting to do low weight. High rep
customer_reviews.author: shanrock

customer_reviews.title: Great value & gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, awesome home option. May replace the rope cables with something else for a little more smoothness but highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like this but the board mat is very narrow. The cords are kind of loose, making it difficult to do several things. I wish they had a bit of bungee to them instead of plain rope
customer_reviews.author: McQuadeH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great inexpensive reformer. I am able to do all the core exercises I could want with ease. Well, as easy as Pilates can be!! It was easy to put together and the cords are as tight as I need them to be. For the price, you can’t beat this one
customer_reviews.author: Laney Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: what a great solution to the expense Pilates presents in the form of classes. love it.
customer_reviews.author: NONO

customer_reviews.title: Really love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It’s pretty simple to put together and I get a lot out of it. It’s kind of heavy to collapse daily but still worth it. I live in a small apartment and it’s still worth having.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble and use..
customer_reviews.text: i love this little thing. i am small person and this is perfect for me replace pilates class.
customer_reviews.author: kil y smith

customer_reviews.title: Customer support is bad
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come with any exercises and one of the cords is soft and needs to be replaced, so I emailed them about that, but they didn't respond. You can see in the images.
customer_reviews.author: Alldayeveryday

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Legit enough for the price. So far so good. Happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: The smell has prevented me from using it so far ...
customer_reviews.text: The smell has prevented me from using it so far. It is still "airing out" in a spare room. I have an older machine with the same logo that wore out after many many years. The cushion on this is also much thinner. Rating maybe higher once I'm able to actually use it!
customer_reviews.author: L. D.

customer_reviews.title: OK for home use in a small space
customer_reviews.text: This reformer was the best I could find to fit in a small space. It is fine for doing basic moves and keeping me into my Pilates habit during Covid. However, it's very narrow - I am 5'7", average build, and I can not put my arms down bedside me on the carriage when I lay down - I have to put my arms across my chest or put my hands under my rear. Also, the padding on the carriage is very thin, so anything I try to do kneeling I need an extra layer of padding.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the $230 sale price I got. Worth $400 or more
customer_reviews.text: Once unpacked took about 10 minutes to put together. I don’t have an area where I can just leave it unfolded all the time so I love the fold up feature. I just prop it behind a living room chat while not in use. Not the sturdiest machine, wants to come off the floor about a centimeter when I am doing full 3 band arm work but nothing I can’t deal with. For the price and compact design I love this machine!
customer_reviews.author: K. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can’t beat it. It’s been great to do Pilates at home during the pandemic. One thing, the resistance cords are less strong than a studio, I’d recommend buying higher resistance cords to replace them if you work out often.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow wow wow! I love this machine! I was a member of a Pilates club and I was devastated when the club closed due to covid. :/ I wish I had purchased this machine sooner... because it’s perfect for the workout that I need! It folds pretty easily so I store it next to my TV, and I unfold it when I’m about to watch my fav shows. For the price... this is a steal! I love it
customer_reviews.author: Anmitsu Frenchie

customer_reviews.title: Want to sell
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine for the price. I bought it but I want to sell it. I cannot return because it passed 30 days
customer_reviews.author: Daniella Scarlett

product_meta.title: Stamina AeroPilates Reformer 287 with 3 Resistance Cords
product_meta.description: The Aero Pilates Reformer 287 is the entry level 3 cord Reformer. The 287 is the perfect Reformer for the budget conscious person who still wants to achieve the long, lean physique that Aero Pilates can help you Attain. The 287 comes with a padded platform, padded foot bar, textured standing platform, foam grips, adjustable headrest, and high density foam shoulder pads. With regular use it will tone and tighten every muscle while it lengthens your spine and retrains your body to move efficiently and gracefully. With 3 black cords you will be able to set the appropriate level of resistance to make your workout as intense as you can endure. The Aero Pilates Reformer also includes 2 workout DVD. Introduction to Aero Pilates and pure Pilates level 1. Recommended use: in home for improved muscle tone, strength, cardio, flexibility, range-of-motion, and centering/relaxation of the mind.
feature_bullets: Adjustable resistance with 3 heavy-duty, elastic bungee cords
Black steel frame; padded Gray platform (17.5 inch wide)

Padded foot bar; high density foam shoulder pads; padded, 3-position Adjustable head rest; foam hand & foot straps for added comfort; six non-skid supports, two on each end and two in the middle, for added stability
Two DVDs: introduction to Aero Pilates; Aero Pilates level 1 pure Pilates; aero Pilates full-color workout wall chart
Foldable frame with wheels for easy portability and storage; easily adjust the rope length at the hand/foot straps

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
